pros: Great place to work overall really
cons: None I can really think of.

job_title: Front of House Staff in Shide, England
cons:
- Your left on your own to greet, serve, answer the phone, deal with collections and work the bar pretty much every shift
- No benefits
-Hours vary from working 7 days a week to 2
- Very short notice on hours
- no rota
- no payslips, even on request

job_title: Front of House Staff in Peterborough, England
pros:
Flexible hours.

Friendly people.

Lunch was made for you.

Nice location.
cons: Never told when we were finishing, only what time we would start.
